verses.text:
Crowning jewel of creation,
Blest and hallowed,
sanctified;
Time and changes all transcending,
Shared for ever, glorified.

Sin and sickness, prayer and weeping
Cease at close of
earthly days;
But Thy Sabbath, Thy Sabbath
Joyful thanksgiving to Thee we raise!

Teach us, Lord, in storm or sunshine
How to truly
rest in Thee;
May Thy Sabbath, Thy Sabbath
And our shelter ever be.

refrain.text:
Blessed Sabbath
made for man,
Gift from the Creator's hand.
